Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>I've had it with cleaning the stable.


There has to be some interesting
news<sp:5:1:0>... Oh?!

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Chat_00>"Matriarch Revitalizes <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>!
Zonai Survey Team's Eyes Turn to Its
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>!
"Kakariko Village has become the latest
tourist destination, as interest in the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> keeps on growing!"
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>Hmm. I wondered what would happen
when a big ol' ruin like that came out
of nowhere.
That chief must be hard at work if it
got popular enough to be featured in
the paper.
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>The whole world's gone mad, hasn't it?


No one could have expected anything like
the Upheaval.
Talk1002: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>I've had it with cleaning the stable.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>It's an amazing thing to know what's
going on in the world without leaving
my chair.
This newspaper is a big deal. Are you
familiar with the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>?

I hear they're based in <clr:0000>northwest Hebra<clr:ffff>.
I sure hope they get some folks to help
out soon. I would hate to see them go.
